docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to my website! I have hosted this website on my home machine. To do so, I have done the following:

  • Written the site using the Markdown format

  • Built the website's HTML and CSS using MKDocs

  • Hosted the website on GitHub

To learn more about me, head over to the About page.

docs.title: Learning MkDocs
docs.text:
It turns out, the Material theme for MkDocs has builtin blog support, which is pretty cool!

I'm trying out a ton of features in MkDocs and in the Material theme. You can see some of my scribblings at the Style Playground.

At the moment, this blog is pretty empty. In the future, I'll bring some cool stuff onto here.

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Hello! I'm Keven Jolly, and you are visiting my website.

This website was written, stylized, and built on my home computer, and deployed on a github repository. I have made use of MkDocs, the Material for MkDocs theme, and GitHub Pages to accomplish this.

Currently, I'm a College student in my early-twenties. I am passionate about computer programming and, more recently, network administration, hence the creation of this site.

There's not much here at the moment, but I am going to be developing and improving this site as I learn new things and gain new skills.

Welcome! If you find that your passion aligns with my own, feel free to browse around!

docs.title: Style Playground
docs.text:
If you've stumbled on this page, hello! This is just a playground for me to experiment with styling and features available in MkDocs and its Material theme.

Just some text... (1)

  1. ... with an annotation!

Note

This is a note! (1)

  1. It also has an annotation!
Note

This is a collapsible note!

This note does not have a title!

This note has...

...a custom title!

Note

Here is an inline note! It provides some context to the text on the left!

Here is some text! The text has some information within it!1

But it seems to be missing something important...1 Maybe if you look to the right a little bit more?

Tip

Something you should know is listed here!

Info

Something else you should know is listed here!

Question

Something to ask yourself about...

Warning

Something important is listed here!

Danger

Something very important is listed here!

Success

Something went right! Yay!

Failure

Something went wrong! Nay!

Bug

Something isn't working quite right!

Example

Here is an example of something!

Quotation

Something someone else said is listed here!

Tab ATab BTab C

This tab is dedicated to the letter A

This tab is dedicated to the letter B

This tab is dedicated to the letter C

HTML and CSS, Brought to you by the WWW
